Hurry up and win one of a 100 Steam Keys for Curvy3D 3! 
Curvy 3D is a fun and easy 3D modelling program. Draw or trace shapes that turn straight into 3D forms. Use sculpt and paint brushes to add details to your models. Curvy is a streamlined modeller made with the new 3D artist in mind. It is great at sculpting organic and natural forms to use in your own 3D illustrations. System Requirements: 
Microsoft Windows; DirectX 8.0 compatible 3D Graphics Card Publisher:
